subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Matt Irvin scored two power-play goals, leading the Boston Bruins to a 2-0 victory over the Devils in Providence, R.I., in the preseason opener for both teams.
snippet: Matt Irvin scored two power-play goals, leading the Boston Bruins to a 2-0 victory over the Devils in Providence, R.I., in the preseason opener for both teams.
